short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A perfect new tab FootballTab themed extension for your Chrome browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Change the background image on new tabs to feature cool Football image! The extension also provides users with a Custom Web Search, and gives news about NFL players.

By installing "FootballTab" extension, you agree to the EULA and Privacy Policy, and to set your new tab page to FootballTab.

Free stock media content is distributed by Freepik - https://www.freepik.com/

Privacy Policy: https://thefootballtab.com/privacy

EULA/Terms of Service: https://thefootballtab.com/terms
